Package uk.co.datumedge.redislauncher

Provides classes and interfaces to control redis servers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LifecyclePolicy
    An interface for defining a policy of a redis server's lifecycle.
    LocalRedisServerMBean
    JMX MBean interface for a redis server.
    RedisServer
    Interface for controlling a redis server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlwaysDestroyLifecyclePolicy
    A lifecycle policy that destroys the server when an exception occurs, or when the JVM terminates.
    Configuration
    Configuration for a redis server.
    Configuration.Builder
    A builder of Configuration instances.
    Configuration.ProgrammaticBuilder
    A builder of Configuration instances that are configured programmatically.
    ConnectionProperties
    Properties that govern how a LocalRedisServer connects to a redis-server process.
    ConnectionProperties.Builder
    A builder of ConnectionProperties.
    Execution
    An execution of a redis server.
    Execution.Builder
    A builder of Execution instances.
    KeepRunningOnErrorLifecyclePolicy
    A lifecycle policy that keeps the server running when an exception occurs.
    LocalRedisServer
    A redis server which runs in a separate process on the same host as the JVM.
    NullProcessDestroyer
    A ProcessDestroyer implementation that does nothing.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FailedToStopException
    Checked exception thrown when a redis server could not be stopped.
    ServerNotReadyException
    Checked exception thrown when the server was not ready to serve requests during startup.

Package uk.co.datumedge.redislauncher Description

Provides classes and interfaces to control redis servers. The primary class is LocalRedisServer which is able to control a redis server residing on the same host as the JVM.
